I am not sure about starting training today or tomorrow, what do you think about it?

Of course, rest and recovery are essential, too. Yet, consider pushing the "tomorrow" into an hour or two from now, just to keep that momentum going. Once done, reassess and make a well-informed decision about the following day. Remember, every step brings us closer to our goals.
I will not train, because I am waiting for some friends, it would be nice to start training these afternoon.
